name: openapi-fetcher
title: OpenAPI Fetcher
description: Browse and manage OpenAPI specifications directly from Raycast. Add specs from files, URLs, or popular APIs, and easily access their endpoints and manage API tokens.
author: zebapy

commands.name: add-openapi-spec
commands.title: Import OpenAPI Spec
commands.subtitle: Add a spec from file, URL, or paste contents
commands.description: Add a new OpenAPI specification URL to your collection

commands.name: list-specs
commands.title: List API Specs
commands.subtitle: View and use locally saved specs
commands.description: View saved OpenAPI specs and browse their endpoints

commands.name: list-tokens
commands.title: Manage Tokens
commands.subtitle: View and manage stored API tokens
commands.description: View, update, and delete stored API tokens for your specs

commands.name: browse-popular-specs
commands.title: Browse Popular APIs
commands.subtitle: Download a spec from popular APIs
commands.description: Discover and add popular OpenAPI specifications

commands.name: request-history
commands.title: Request History
commands.subtitle: View past API requests and responses
commands.description: Browse your API request history with request and response details

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
